## Agent Overview

**Agent Name:**

**Agent Class:** (Research / Code / Orchestration / Validation / Education / Infrastructure)

**One-line description:**

### What does this agent do?
Describe the narrow, well-defined function this agent performs.


### Inputs
What does the agent need to operate? (data sources, API access, context, etc.)


### Outputs
What does the agent produce? (reports, code, alerts, data, etc.)


### Dependencies
What libraries, APIs, or services does this agent require?


### How to test
Describe how reviewers can verify the agent works correctly.


---

### Checklist
- [ ] Agent code included or linked
- [ ] Documentation explains usage
- [ ] Test suite included
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] Follows agent standards (see docs/agent-standards.md)
